description: Primes p such that x^4 = 12 has a solution mod p.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok [p_]:=Reduce[Mod[x^4 - 12, p]== 0, x, Integers]=!= False; Select[Prime[Range[180]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 12 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(800) | exists{x: x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^4 eq 12}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 12 2012(PARI) select( n->ispower( Mod(12,n), 4), primes(1000) ) /* _Joerg Arndt_, Sep 12 2012 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
